title: Drawing, "Study.  Cascades of the Ausable River, near Keeseville, N. Y.", August 13, 1856
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  Au Sable River Aug. 13 / 56 / Near Keeseville
description: Horizontal view of the upper falls framed by sandstone walls in the central middleground, with the lower falls visible in the left center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study.  Cascades of the Ausable River, near Keeseville, N. Y.", August 13, 1856.
August 13, 1856. Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-187.
